actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 206 of the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to include in the final system plan, required by such section, the designation of certain rail properties necessary for the transportation of fossil fuel.

summary.text: Requires, under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act, the designation in the final system plan of rail properties for use in the transportation of fossil fuel.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 206 of the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to include in the final system plan, required by such section, the designation of certain rail properties necessary for the transportation of fossil fuel.
